bibl.title: The Archaeology of Pilgrimage: Abu Mina and Beyond.
bibl.note: Introduction. - The Cult of St Menas at Abu Mina [including artefacts: ampullae, etc.]. - Other Major Pilgrim Centres of the Eastern Mediterranean. - Conclusions. - P. 322: Appendix: Examples of Evidence from Selected Pilgrim Sites. - Avec résumés en anglais et en français.
bibl.seg: Susanne Bangert, The Archaeology of Pilgrimage: Abu Mina and Beyond.

David M. Gwynn & Susanne Bangert (edd.), conceived and co-ordinated by Luke Lavan, with the assistance of Carlos Machado & Michael Mulryan, Religious Diversity in Late Antiquity = Late Antique Archaeology. 6 (Leiden, 2010) pp. 293-327, 1 tabl., 16 figg.; - 545.

Introduction. - The Cult of St Menas at Abu Mina [including artefacts: ampullae, etc.]. - Other Major Pilgrim Centres of the Eastern Mediterranean. - Conclusions. - P. 322: Appendix: Examples of Evidence from Selected Pilgrim Sites. - Avec résumés en anglais et en français.
